page.title: 03Religion
page.content: The incumbent organises activities within Crowcombe, Bicknoller and Sampford Brett. In addition to the Rector various members of the laity lead services and this is welcomed. Home groups meet for prayer, Bible study and fellowship. Confirmation classes are also organised in the home. Other denominations include Jehova's Witnesses, Christian Scientists, Roman Catholics, Methodists, Athiests, Agnostics, Faith Healing, Born Again Christians and Superstitions Combined with Christianity and Church Ritual. A voluntary rota exists for Church cleaning, flower arranging, teaching the children who attend Sunday School and print the Parish Newsletter which is distributed monthly. The P.C.C. (Parochial Church Council) oversees the work within the parishes.
